name: "Hanging Post of Coatepec Mountain"
description: Commonly found within the "Scions of the Canopy," this wooden fencing exhibits a remarkably simple structure, constructed from "Ashen Aratiku Wood" and rope. Unlike conventional fencing, its distinctive feature lies in the metal rings on the wooden posts and the slack ropes strung across them. These metal rings serve as emergency hooks for rope attachments, providing support when necessary. The intentionally slack ropes offer a degree of cushioning or assistance in urgent situations, reducing the risk of injury. However, these features are secondary safety measures, and the chief advises against frequent use of these functionalities...
